about_the_game:
Space is a dangerous place. Navigate the cosmos dodging everything the universe throws at you to a stimulating electronic soundtrack.

Each new piece of star matter you collect will grow your mass. Increase your mass and you'll evolve, reaching new planetary sizes, gas giants and powerful stars. What will you evolve into next?

-Use different specials: dashes, shields, and solar flares to gain an advantage in the chaos.

-Dodge asteroids, meteors, comets, neutron stars, black holes and more.

-Featuring realistic gravity and physics based movement.

-Progress through 11 different stages, each with its own set of threats and challenges.

-Use worm holes to leap across space. Some leaps will give bonuses, some will make you sweat.

-A focus inducing electronic soundtrack to help you get into the flow.

-Procedural content: no play through is the same.

-One difficulty setting that adjusts as you play — there is no easy way out.

Each new piece of star matter you collect will grow your mass. Increase your mass and you'll evolve, reaching new planetary sizes, gas giants and powerful stars. What will you evolve into next?

-Featuring realistic gravity and physics based movement.

-Progress through 11 different stages, each with its own set of threats and challenges.

-Use worm holes to leap across space. Some leaps will give bonuses, some will make you sweat.

-A focus inducing electronic soundtrack to help you get into the flow.

-Procedural content: no play through is the same.

-One difficulty setting that adjusts as you play — there is no easy way out.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support Metal API
  • Storage: 195 MB available space

name: Hungry Galaxies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / DirectX 10+ support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 195 MB available space

short_description: HUNGRY GALAXIES is a deadly space survival game. Seek out constellations of Star Matter to grow your mass and evolve, increasing your gravity and gaining new abilities. But watch out! Space is a dangerous place.
